name: Mangonade
description: A refreshing mango-based summer drink with a fizzy lemon twist.
directions: Peel the mango and cut it into pieces.
Blend the mango until it becomes a smooth slush.
Add chilled water and blend again.
Stir in lemon soda gently to preserve the fizz.
Add sugar or honey if extra sweetness is needed.
Serve with ice cubes and garnish with a mint leaf (optional).
